entry.title: What if 9-1-1 was in Squid Games?
entry.summary:
Author: Thats_Nice_H0n3y

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 6,735Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 7

Summary: Buck chuckled nervously at Eddie's seriousness before holding up a golden card with a circle, a triangle, and a square drawn on it. "Got this card this morning, the man said that I could participate in different games to win a ton of cash. Seems easy enough, right?" Chimney grabbed the card from Buck's grip, waving off the confused, "Hey!" Before bursting out laughing. "You got one too!? That guy must have slapped you hard. Man, I missed it."Or: What if 9-1-1 was in the FIRST season of Squid Games?Sadly, yes, there will be death.
